author: Reuters
title: Instacart workers strike as labour unrest grows over safety, wages during coronavirus crisis
description: Strikers and their supporters asked for hazard pay increases, paid sick leave and better protective measures while on the job
content:
NEW YORK — Some of the roughly 200,000 workers at U.S. online grocery delivery company Instacart said they were striking on Monday as labour unrest grows globally over safety and wages for people working through the coronavirus crisis.
